Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $[Call($this, "examine"); return nil;] $[Call($this, "examine_puzzleone"); return nil;] $[Call($this, "examine_puzzletwo"); return nil;] $[Call($this, "examine_puzzlethree"); return nil;] $[Call($this, "examine_puzzlefour"); return nil;] $[Call($this, "examine_puzzlefive"); return nil;] Something silvery draws your attention to Transylvania. The globe is lithely dusted.

Three colorful feathers attached to the black hair of the giant Indian painted over Patagonia. $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 2) { return "The edge of one of the feathers is faded, possibly from people pinching it in order to perform something with it."; }]

Three colorful feathers attached to the black hair of the giant Indian painted over Patagonia. $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 2 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 2 ) { return "The edge of one of the feathers is faded, possibly from people pinching it in order to perform something with it."; }] $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 7 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 7) { return "Your instincts tell you to pull the feather."; }]
Three colorful feathers attached to the black hair of the giant Indian painted over Patagonia.
An inscription reading: Transylvania. It appears to be dusty.
The Northern Hemisphere of the odd globe. I is separated by a little gap symbolizing the equator from the Southern Hemisphere.
The Northern Hemisphere of the odd globe.

A perfectly polished pyramid made of clear mountain quartz. $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 2 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 2 ) { return "You wonder how the light would play with it."; }] $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 7 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 7) { return "For that you need to illuminate the pyramid with a light source."; }]
A perfectly polished pyramid made of clear mountain quartz.

A metallic figurine made from silvery substance of some darker shade. It emerges from the ley globe in the shape of a snake's head and continues into the globe's body seamlessly. $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 2 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 2 ) { return "You might be able to turn it though the possibilities are limited by the globe's grooves."; }]
A silvery metallic figurine emerging from the ley globe. The figurine is shaped in the form of a snake's head and continues into the globe's body.
The Southern Hemisphere of the odd globe. I is separated by a little gap symbolizing the equator from the Northern Hemisphere.
The Southern Hemisphere of the odd globe.

A hand painted spear on the ebony globe. $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 2 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 2) { return "Nothing more."; }] $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 3 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 3) { return "I don't joke. Really."; }] $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 4 || Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 4) { return "We were just curious how many things you will try to do to initiate something with a reasonless prop."; }] $[if(Int($actor."skill:mental:observation") > 7|| Int($actor."career:mental:observation") > 7) { return "We put in a counter too. You won the main prize! Congrats."; }]
It really is a spear. Merely painted.
Transylvania is a region in Middle-Europe deserving a second glance.

X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "You need to find a way to open the container."); return FALSE;
